title: Hooke's Law Interactive Demonstration
description: An interactive MicroSim demonstrating Hooke's Law (F = kx) with a vertical spring-mass system. Users can drag the mass, adjust spring constant and mass, collect data points, and visualize the linear relationship between force and displacement.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Hooke's Law
